<b>compōnō</b> <b>-is</b> <b>-ère</b> <b>-posùí, -posìtum</b> <br> <b>conpōno</b> <b>-is</b> <b>-ère</b> <b>-posùí, -posìtum</b> <br> <small>v. tr.</small> <br> <small>Obs.: Inf. pass. componier Catul. 68, 141. Part. pass. sincopado compostus Verg. En. 1, 249.</small>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>I-Sent. próprio</small> &ensp; Por juntamente, juntar, reunir &ensp; <small>Cíc. Verr. 1, 116.</small> <br> <b>6</b> &ensp; <small>II-Daí:</small> &ensp; Fingir, simular, urdir, inventar &ensp; <small>Plaut. #### Fonseca

<b>Compono</b> -<b>is</b> -<b>osui</b> -<b>ositum</b> -<b>ere</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; compôr, pôr por ordem, collocar junto. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>Virg.</small> &ensp; enfeitar, concertar, ornar. <br> <b>3</b> &ensp; concordar, ajustar. <br> <b>4</b> &ensp; assemelhar, comparar, confrontar. <br> <b>5</b> &ensp; edificar. <br> <b>6</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; compôr obras de espirito. <br> <b>7</b> &ensp; fingir, inventar mentiras. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>componere aliquem &ensp; <small><small>Hor</small></small> &ensp; <small>Enterrar alguem</small> <br> componere amicos auersos &ensp; <small><small>Hor</small></small> &ensp; <small>Reconciliar amigos desunidos</small> <br> componere risum ore mendaci &ensp; <small><small>Tibul</small></small> &ensp; <small>Fingir hum semblante rizonho</small> <br> componere tumulo &ensp; <small><small>Ovid</small></small> &ensp; <small>Enterrar alguem</small> </p> 
 <small>pret. de Compono</small> <b>Composui</b>




#### Velez

<b>Compono</b> -<b>is</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; compor, ajuntar, comparar <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>quandoque pro Finire, Claudere, Statuere, Fingere, Sepelire</small> </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>1</b><br>paruis componere magna solebant &ensp; <small><small>i, cum parvis</small></small> <br> <br><b>X</b><br>componere membra &ensp; <small>descançar</small> <br> componere urbem &ensp; <small>edificar</small> <br> ex composito aliquid facere &ensp; <small><small>i, ex conventione</small></small> </p>




#### Cardoso

<b>Compono</b> <b>is</b> <b>sui</b> <b>situm</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; cõpor. ou pacificar </p>
